root.publications: Guthrie, Malcolm. 1948. The Classification of the Bantu Languages. London: Oxford University Press for the International African Institute.
root.pub-comments: "Where the prefix to be attached to the form of the name shown here is known, it is placed immeediately after it. The fact that in some cases no prefix is given must not be interpreted as meaning that none is used, but simply that up to the present there is no evidence on the point." Prefixes that Guthrie included have been included following the node name and delimited by a comma, for instance 'Subu, į-'" (Guthrie: 1948 74).
